attributes.action: Allow the homeless ex services to live in vacant barracks
attributes.additional_details: They could pay a nominal fee for the food and accommodation. they will then have a base of operations an address so that employers give them work also the support of their colleagues in the same situation.
attributes.background: to some the military service was/is their life , they gave their all on many occasions . stop abandoning the troops as soon as they pick up their discharge papers . They need help as much as possible to adjust.
